price: Aravuga ati “Aba (bakobwa bose bo mu gihugu) ni abakobwa banjye; bityo niba mukeneye gushaka (ngaho nimuze mbabashyingire, aho kwifuza abagabo bagenzi banyu).”
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
